name: aroid
content:

any plant of the arum family (= a group of plants with flowers, grown both indoors and outdoors). There are many different types of aroid, including the calla lily and anthurium: People always think of white lilies but there are hundreds of different aroids. The botanical garden is particularly well known for its collection of aroids.
More examplesFewer examplesAroids are very popular office plants.One incredible feature of aroids is that they can heat up their flower parts to release aromas that attract insects. The archetypal aroid is the calla lily.
